ygData.subject: Suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Since you are hanging out in Guk, try to get your hands on the dark elf hide gloves and the troll-hide belt.  They are bard/rogue only so the demand isn t as
ygData.messageBody:
Since you are hanging out in Guk, try to get your hands on the dark elf hide
gloves and the troll-hide belt. They are bard/rogue only so the demand isn't as
high for them. Those two will give you ten more points to your STR. After I
got those two items I was able to start wearing bronze plate and still have room
to carry stuff. My base STR is 76 and with items is now 100. Another option is
the Blackened Iron Crown in Runnyeye. I think it also adds five points to STR
plus bonuses to resists. For weapons, thulian claws seem to be the bard weapon
of choice for those in their 20s and will cost around 400PP.

Galtin of E'ci


> Message: 20
> Date: Tue, 12 Oct 1999 10:24:36 -0600
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: Suggestions?
>
> Hail all!
> After my latest adventure grouping with our guilds new wizard in cleri'c
> clothing I decided to foray off and try my hand at soloing once more. I
> have journeyed to far off Upper Guk where I have been taking on the Heart
> Spiders found there. The experience has thus far been most fruitful both in
> terms of silks and xp. While I died 4 times the first nite, my ping was at
> an all time record low (for me) and I was able to make it back to my body in
> 27 minutes! I have found my experience bar moving steadily upward and
> expect to make 18th level tonite.
>
> My question is this? What sort of equipment should I start looking for at
> my level to help improve my performance. A lot of the equipment I have now
> is already better than I could get on my own as my trade skills have
> actually been profitable! Sssshhh... don't tell Verant. I'm thinking what
> I need most is a primary weapon upgrade, I am currently alternating between
> a Dragoon Dirk and a Screaming Mace as primary. I have about 250pp, but can
> easily make another 100-200 by selling cured silk this week. I welcome any
> suggestions that don't require me to carry a stupid axe ;)
>
> I think my armor is as good as it will be for a while, except maybe for my
> helm. I have Barbed Arms and legs, Crush tunic, Bloodstained Mantle,
> Bearskin Boots, a sleek black cape, Leatherfoot Raider's helm, 2 jagged
> bands, bracer of erolissi, silver-plated bracer, purity belt (still?),
> electrum pearl necklace (upgrade to gold?). I use a chitin shell shield or
> dual wield depending on the situation. Any ideas what armor upgrades I
> could get without bumping my weight up too much? I'm a natural weakling
> (Str73) so have concentrated on stat boosting armor.
>
> Thanks for the input!
>
> Kitasi
> somewhere in Guk looking for a 'real' cleric
>
>
>
